sentences.en: 'It's the damp , sir , what settles on my chest and voice,'said Jerry.
sentences.cn: “ 我这胸口和嗓子都是叫湿气害的, 先生, ”杰瑞说.

sentences.en: 'Jerry , if you wish to take something to eat, you can.
sentences.cn: “ 杰瑞, 如果你打算吃点点心, 现在可以去吃.

sentences.en: 'Yes, Jerry,'repeated Mr. Cruncher, sitting down to tea.
sentences.cn: “ 是的, 杰瑞, ”克朗彻先生一边重复她的话, 一边坐下来喝茶.

sentences.en: 'Young Jerry,'said Mr. Cruncher, turning to his offspring,'it's a buryin '.'
sentences.cn: “ 小杰瑞, ”克朗彻先生转身对他的下一代说, “ 是埋死人呢. ”

sentences.en: " No, miss, " returned Jerry, " It'shall not be named to you.
sentences.cn: “ 不会的, 小姐, ” 杰瑞回答, “ 我是不会告诉你的.

sentences.en: He threw one of the biggest showbiz bashes of the year as a 36th birthday party for Jerry Hall.
sentences.cn: 为了庆祝杰里·霍尔的36岁生日，他举办了当年演艺圈最盛大的庆祝宴会。

sentences.en: In 1934, Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster created Superman.
sentences.cn: 在1934年, 杰瑞?西格尔和乔?舒斯特创造了超人.

sentences.en: Jerry and Lise know their romance inflicts hurt on others, but they can't help themselves.
sentences.cn: 杰里和丽丝知道他们的恋情会对别人造成伤害，但他们情难自已。

sentences.en: Jerry hoarsely professed himself at Miss Pross's service.
sentences.cn: 杰瑞嘶声嘶气地表示愿为普洛丝小姐效劳.

sentences.en: Jerry is an amateur who dances because he feels like it.
sentences.cn: 杰里是个业余跳舞爱好者，他跳舞是因为自己喜欢。

sentences.en: Jerry was already unhappy because he fumbled the ball, but his teammates kept rubbing it in.
sentences.cn: 本来杰瑞就很不高兴,因为他失了球, 而他的队友们还一再提那件事.

sentences.en: Jerry, you honest tradesman, it wouldn't suit your line of business!
sentences.cn: 杰瑞, 你是个诚实的生意人, 这对你的业务可是不利!

sentences.en: The place is a bit jerry-built.
sentences.cn: 这地方建造得有些不牢靠。

sentences.en: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.--Jerry Rice
sentences.cn: 今天我做了别人不愿做的事，明天我就能做到别人所不能做的事。

sentences.en: Tom and Jerry came to blows when they were invited to a party.
sentences.cn: 当汤姆和杰瑞应邀参加宴会时,两人打了起来.

phrases.tran_cn: 甜心先生（电影名，又名杰里·马奎尔、征服情海）
汤姆和杰里（动画片名，又译猫和老鼠）；吃喝玩乐的浪荡子
